attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Media campaigns focusing on the problems of obesity in children and young adults are having an adverse effect on sufferers from eating disorders such as Anorexia Nervosa.  Together with the endless supply of food and cooking programmes on the TV, young sufferers of Anorexia are getting messages about obesity which are reinforcing the negative thoughts about body image which they are already experiencing.  This petition asks the government to ensure there is a more balanced view presented and to raise awareness of the symptoms and dangers of Anorexia and other similar eating disorders, as well as the dangers of obesity, in its bid to improve the health of the nation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "consider and address the damage caused to those suffering from eating disorders such as Anorexia Nervosa by campaigns focusing on obesity, and to take a more balanced approach to encourage healthy lifestyles in the young."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19467
